page.title: 12EMPLOYMENT IN TONGE MOOR.
page.content: Many of the people in our area do not travel far to their place of work. Beloit-Walmsley, metal manufacturers is a principal employer of factory workers in our area. We found other people's occupations to be very varied: security guard, dental lab. technician, computer programmer,gas appliance fitter, double-glazing fitter and two motor mechanics. Self employed people we interviewed were in the plumbing, painting and decorating and building trades. Of ladies interviewed, 7 worked in shops, one was a school dinner supervisor and 3 are cleaners, one in an office, one in a pub and one in a car showroom. A few people did not have a job. They were unemployed, housewives or retired people.
